Setting Up Studio CLI
=====================

To make use of the Studio CLI tool, run commands from your Vuforia Studio projects folder ``Documents/VuforiaStudio/Projects/``

See |location_link| for further documentation.

.. |location_link| raw:: html

   <a href="https://github.com/PTC-Academic/CLab-Dev-CLI" target="_blank">Studio CLI Repo </a>


Install the Studio CLI package:

.. code:: bash

    gulp

Initializing Projects
---------------------

Initializing a new Studio project::

    $ vufo init
